Washroom Automation Touch-Free Technology For a Healthier Environment
Auto Flush® Eliminates cross-contamination from handle touching and ensures urinals and toilets are always flushed Sophisticated sensor technology guarantees dependable activation Easily converts manual flush valves to touch-free
Auto Soap® Attractive touch-free design provides a luxurious and hygienic hand-washing experience while controlled dosing reduces soap waste New pump and delivery tube with every refill, so the unit is always clean and operating efficiently Simple quick-twist “one-handed” refill loading
Auto Faucet® Eliminates cross-contamination from handle touching. Angled design with sophisticated sensor technology guarantees dependable activation.
